title: Lip Sync 2024
description: Lip Sync is a title that is self-explanatory; where each team would lip sing and dance to a variety of songs which are tied to a certain theme of the group which can be a team of RA's in a dorm, or people who want to pay tribute to a gorilla that is no longer with us.

title: Canyon Cooldown
description: Canyon Cooldown is the ultimate time to cooldown alongside your friends on some radical waterslides. Grab your buddies and come out to have a splashin' good time with beverages, merch, and best of all... waterslides!

title: Silent Disco
description: Have you ever danced your heart out to the sound of silence? Now is your opportunity! Well, not exactly science, but taking your headphones off will sure make it seem that way. Either way, come dance your heart out with friends at the Silent Disco!

title: GCU's Got Talent
description: Do you have what it takes to become the face of GCU? Come watch your fellow lopes compete head-to-head to see who has the best talent at GCU. Between Singing, Dancing, and other forms of talents, you'll be entertained the whole night,

title: Lope-a-Palooza
description: Go Lopes Go! Show your school spirit at the hypest pep rally you have ever attended. We bleed purple in Lopes Country, so come experience the biggest party in college sports at the arena.
